title: I'm Having Trouble Dating After My Divorce
description:
Brent has started dating again after a failed 20-year marriage, and he's worried that he doesn't know how to find “Ms. Right.” - Dr. Laura: "Finding “the one” is easier once you know what you need, want and expect from a relationship."

What do you most want/need/expect from a relationship? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
